title: Comment on Kanye West says Jay Z has hitmen: â€œPlease donâ€™t send them at my headâ€ by "Your Idols Become Your Rivals": Understanding Drake and Kanye's Relationship | Certified BOOTLEG
text:
Reddit 
Following the lead of Donald Trump, 2020 presidential candidate Kanye West has become increasingly unhinged with some of his recent comments. During his Thursday night concert in San Jose, the Chicago rapper-producer expressed his support for the President-elect while calling on â€œblack people [to] stop focusing on racism.â€ Kanye returned to the stage in Sacramento on Saturday night; over the course of the show, he called out BeyoncÃ© for playing politics with the VMAs, suggested Jay Z â€œgot killers,â€ criticized President Obama for trying too hard to be perfect, and suggested DJ Khaled engaged in payola. At one point, he said â€œIâ€™m on my Trump shit tonight.â€ He ultimately ended his concert after 30 minutes, saying, â€œRight now, press, get ready to write your passive aggressive, LeBron James racist comments, Season 4, racist commentsâ€”get ready to have a field day press! Get ready! Get ready, because the show is over.â€ 
Read transcriptions of Kanyeâ€™s full comments below (via Pitchfork ). 
On BeyoncÃ©: 
â€œBeyoncÃ©â€”I was hurt because I heard that you said you wouldnâ€™t perform unless you won Video of the Year over me and over â€˜Hotline Blingâ€™ [at the VMAs]. In my opinionâ€¦now donâ€™t go dissing BeyoncÃ©, sheâ€™s great. Taylor Swift is great. We are all great people. We are all equal. But sometimes we be playing the politics too much and forget who we are just to win. Fuck winning, fuck looking cool. Fuck looking cool. Fuck being cool. Fuck all that, bruh. Iâ€™ve been sent here to give yâ€™all my truth even at the risk of my own life, my own success, my own career.â€ 
On Jay Z: 
â€œJay Zâ€”call me, bruh. You still ainâ€™t called me. Jay Z, I know you got killers. Please donâ€™t send them at my head. Please call me. Talk to me like a man.â€ 
On Hillary Clinton: 
â€œThis Saint Pablo tour is the most relevant [thing] happening. If your old ass keeps following old models, youâ€™ll be Hillary Clinton.â€ 
On President Obama: 
â€œObama couldnâ€™t make America great because he couldnâ€™t be him to be who he was. Black men have been slaves. Obama wasnâ€™t allowed to do this [screams] and still win. He had to be perfect. But being perfect donâ€™t always change shit, bro. Being perfect donâ€™t always change shit, bro.â€ 
On DJ Khaled: 
â€œIs it just me or did you hear that song so many timesâ€”you say you wanna play â€˜For Freeâ€™. Aye, aye. You know what it is, though? Because aye, I love Drake. I love Khaled. But they set that song up, bro. â€¦ Khaled, I know you got hitters from Miami. Please do not send them at my head. I just want to have a conversation about how we playing radioâ€™s game. Khaled, you a real nigga. Khaled, you a real nigga. You got the keys.â€ Kanye tonight in Sacramento. No words. #SaintPabloTour pic.twitter.com/TV7fZ4YO1w
